body: Ah! I've got this one! Picked it up a few years ago at winter Komiket... 2011? Good times. And now I'm curious to see what the sequels have. :D

Since I can't read Japanese, I can't tell if Noah is a cadet or if Betty is just playing things off. But if Noah does know, and Betty is constantly getting violated, with Sparky being untouched. Wouldn't it make more sense for DeGill to send Noah with Betty's team?
